name: Death is in the Air
description:
On Rail shooter inspired in StarFox and alike. Created for Ludum Dare 47 JAM cathegory (mostly because I run out of time)

You are trapped in a loop filled with enemies, you must survive as long as possible. Keep killing enemies and your ship will improve.

- How long can you last? -

Controls:

  •  WASD: move
  •  Mouse: Aim
  •  Left Click: Shoot
